title: Bloodborne PSX | Hidden Gems with KC and Jesse
description:
Starting this Tuesday, each week KC, Jesse, Amy or Will, will be checking out a new recently released indie game that they think you shouldn't skip out on. This week, we're checking out Bloodborne PSX, a demake of Bloodborne.

title: Dark Souls the TTRPG Is Using D&D Rules and That's Dumb | Slightly Something Else
description:
This week on Slightly Something Else, Yahtzee and Jack discuss the recent announcement that the Dark Souls TTRPG will be using D&D rules and why that's dumb.

title: Mario Kart 9 Needs to Go Full Smash | The Takeaway
description:
Rumors about Mario Kart 9's reveal are swirling around alone and Marty has some ideas on what the next entry in the long-running series should offer.
